def mergesort(arr):
    if len(arr) < 1:
        return arr
    width = 1
    while width < len(arr):
        left = 0
        while left < len(arr):
            mid = left + width
            right = min(left + 2 * width, len(arr))
            left_arr = arr[left:mid]
            right_arr = arr[mid:right]
            i = j = 0
            k = left
            while i < len(left_arr) and j < len(right_arr):
                if left_arr[i] <= right_arr[j]:
                    arr[k] = left_arr[i]
                    i += 1
                else:
                    arr[k] = right_arr[j]
                    j += 1
                k += 1
            while i < len(left_arr):
                arr[k] = left_arr[i]
                i += 1
                k += 1
            while j < len(right_arr):
                arr[k] = right_arr[j]
                j += 1
                k += 1
            left += 2 * width
        width *= 2
    return arr
